title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2022 Comments on the Dismissal of Kwasi Kwarteng
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, the Business Secretary, on Twitter on 14 October 2022.
content:
The Prime Minister has acted decisively to provide the economic stability our country needs.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

As a government, we must now get on and deliver the pro-growth reforms that will lay the foundations for our future prosperity.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
